import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
v = sorted(list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())))

while len(v) > 1:
    x = v.pop(0)
    y = v.pop(0)
    v.append((x + y) / 2)
    v.sort()

print(v[0])

N = int(input())
v = list(map(int, input().split()))

v.sort()

for i in range(N-1):
    v[i+1] = (v[i] + v[i+1]) / 2

print(v[N-1])

import sys

def main():
    N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    ingredients = sorted(list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())))
    while len(ingredients) != 1:
        ingredients.append((ingredients[0] + ingredients[1]) / 2)
        ingredients.pop(0)
        ingredients.pop(0)
        ingredients.sort()
    print(ingredients[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    ingredients = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    ingredients.sort()
    while len(ingredients) > 1:
        x = ingredients.pop(0)
        y = ingredients.pop(0)
        ingredients.append((x + y) / 2)
        ingredients.sort()
    print(ingredients[0])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
ingredients = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ingredients.sort()

for i in range(N-1):
    ingredients[i+1] = (ingredients[i] + ingredients[i+1]) / 2

print(ingredients[N-1])

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
ingredients = sorted([int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()])

while len(ingredients) > 1:
    ingredients = sorted([(ingredients[i] + ingredients[i+1])/2 for i in range(len(ingredients)-1)])

print(ingredients[0])
